title: Medieval Night Siege: Fury of Castile - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212ad Mod Gameplay
description:
BATTLE STARTS: 5:00
Night has fallen and many have gone to sleep. But war never sleeps! The army of Castile and Burgundy are sieging a Norwegian settlement.  A great night siege is under way!  Enjoy the Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
